Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or legitimate sources to support the statement that Queen Elizabeth II made the quoted remarks about Trump.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the quoted statement from Queen Elizabeth II is true, even though there is no evidence to support it.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Queen Elizabeth II does not give interviews or publicly comment on politics, as stated by Buckingham Palace.
Understate: The claim may understate the lack of credibility and legitimacy of the anonymous post on an online forum from which the quote originated.
Exaggerate: The claim may exaggerate the significance of the alleged suppressed interview and the supposed praise of Trump by Queen Elizabeth II.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider the possibility that the quote attributed to Queen Elizabeth II is fabricated or falsely attributed to her.
